pages.text: The $(l)Tool Vise$() is used to upgrade the Durability, Reach, Mining Speed and Copious of $(l)Vault Pickaxes$(). $(br2)The bar indicates the $(l)chance of success$() to apply a new upgrade, which decreases after each upgrade. $(br2)Be aware that using the Tool Vise $(l)may break your Pickaxe!$()
